name: TCW
bossPosition: Managing Director - head of sovereign research
goal: TCW is an investment management business with significant investments in many EU countries, mainly marketable securities such as government bonds, corporate bonds, and equities.  To understand better the EU investment outlook, from time to time we meet with EU officials to discuss the macroeconomic and policy outlook across the EU and in individual EU member countries.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Economy, finance and the euro, Enlargement, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: EU budgetary policy, fiscal policy oversight of member countries, rule of law (i.e. investment climate) in specific member countries, EU foreign policy, trade policy, etc.
